name: Mech Chip
description: Mech Chip is an action-adventure platformer with pilotable machinery. Explore the internal labyrinth of the cybersphere, and install yourself into devices to gain new quirks and abilities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better (64bit) Processor: 1.4GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 256 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better (64bit) Processor: 2GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 256 MB available space
